english.segment1: Lost like a little child. Helpless as a baby. Searchin' desperately to find. Someone who could save me. Then along came from out of nowhere. Precious as the light of day. You gave me something no one could take away. When you took my place
english.segment2: Chained like a prisoner. From the day that I was born. Blamed like a criminal. For the things that I'd done
